mapper.select: SELECT B.BOOK_SEQ, B.BOOK_TITLE, B.BOOK_PRICE, B.BOOK_RENTAL_FEE, B.BOOK_MEMO, R.RENTAL_STATUS AS BOOK_RENTAL_STATUS, B.BOOK_REG_DT, B.BOOK_UPDATE_DT FROM BOOK B LEFT JOIN ( SELECT BOOK_SEQ, RENTAL_STATUS FROM RENTAL WHERE RENTAL_SEQ IN ( SELECT MAX(RENTAL_SEQ) AS RENTAL_SEQ FROM RENTAL GROUP BY BOOK_SEQ ) ) R ON B.BOOK_SEQ = R.BOOK_SEQ

SELECT B.BOOK_SEQ, B.BOOK_TITLE, B.BOOK_PRICE, B.BOOK_RENTAL_FEE, B.BOOK_MEMO, R.RENTAL_STATUS AS BOOK_RENTAL_STATUS, B.BOOK_REG_DT, B.BOOK_UPDATE_DT FROM BOOK B LEFT JOIN ( SELECT BOOK_SEQ, RENTAL_STATUS FROM RENTAL WHERE RENTAL_SEQ IN ( SELECT MAX(RENTAL_SEQ) AS RENTAL_SEQ FROM RENTAL WHERE BOOK_SEQ = #{bookSeq} ) ) R ON B.BOOK_SEQ = R.BOOK_SEQ WHERE B.BOOK_SEQ = #{bookSeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOOK ( BOOK_TITLE, BOOK_PRICE, BOOK_RENTAL_FEE, BOOK_MEMO ) VALUES ( #{bookTitle}, #{bookPrice}, #{bookRentalFee}, #{bookMemo} )
INSERT INTO BOOK_FILE( BOOK_SEQ, ORIGIN_FILE_NAME, RENAME_FILE_NAME, SAVE_PATH ) VALUES ( #{bookSeq}, #{originFileName}, #{renameFileName}, #{savePath} )
mapper.select: SELECT FILE_SEQ, BOOK_SEQ, ORIGIN_FILE_NAME, RENAME_FILE_NAME, SAVE_PATH, REG_DATE FROM BOOK_FILE WHERE BOOK_SEQ = #{bookSeq}
mapper.update: UPDATE BOOK SET BOOK_TITLE = #{bookTitle}, BOOK_PRICE = #{bookPrice}, BOOK_RENTAL_FEE = #{bookRentalFee}, BOOK_MEMO = #{bookMemo}, BOOK_UPDATE_DT = NOW() WHERE BOOK_SEQ = #{bookSeq}
